ThreadTest.cpp File Reference

Tests multiple readers and writers on the same instance of RakPeer. Define _RAKNET_THREADSAFE in RakNetDefines.h before running this. More...

Detailed Description

Tests multiple readers and writers on the same instance of RakPeer. Define _RAKNET_THREADSAFE in RakNetDefines.h before running this.
